pageProps.title: mordecai
pageProps.teaser: Full text geoparsing using spaCy, Geonames and Keras

data.slogan: Full text geoparsing using spaCy, Geonames and Keras
data.description: Extract the place names from a piece of text, resolve them to the correct place, and return their coordinates and structured geographic information.
code_example: geo.geoparse("I traveled from Oxford to Ottawa.")
data.author: Andy Halterman
